appearing to be something, especially when this is not true: He said, with seeming embarrassment, that he would have to cancel the meeting. Synonyms
apparent
ostensible formal

appearing true or obvious, although it might not be: Their seeming reluctance to demand better treatment was puzzling. seemingly adverb [ not gradable ] us
